Hey everyone its not a permanent  solution but to get the full version set you computer time back to the date before you downloaded it. i know its not much but at least you get the full thing

If you know your regedit feel free to do what I did, go to:
Current User->Software->NCH Software->Prism->Registration
Then I changed the Value of RD to its reverse (i.e. 1234 is changed to 4321) not sure if it will continue to work for free and not sure if it will work for you but sometimes you need to try for yourself.
This only works on Windows Vista!! I have Windows 7!!!
